name: Mischief
description:
Explore a little island as a cat. A proyect I did for Videogame Programming at Uni with JMonkeyEngine. Enjoy it and leave some comments ^^

- Controls

mouse move: Camera

w, a, s, d: Movement

spacebar: Hold for gaining jump power, release for jump

shift: Reset jump power

c: 1st Person/3rd Person view

r: Restart

p: Pause
